name: Resident Evil Mercenaries VS.
description: Play Resident Evil Mercenaries VS., CAPCOM's first online multi play iPhone / iPod touch title. About Resident Evil Mercenaries VS.: Resident Evil Mercenaries VS. supports 2 vs 2 online team match / Free for all via Wi-Fi / Internet, 1 vs 1 team / Free for all via Bluetooth and Single player Training and Coin Shooter mode. Play against friends across the Nation!!
